website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding lamp that offers excellent lighting in a sleek and unobtrusive package that remains cool to the touch.
pros: Users appreciate its easy assembly, modern look, and swivel action
We love that it has three light settings and that it offers full, bright light for any room
A 13-pound weighted base means kids and pets won't tip it over
cons: Some users reported trouble with the setting switches

website_summaries.verdict: A stylish minimalist floor lamp that provides ambient lighting without using much electricity.
pros: Lamp head can be tilted to direct light
Integrated 30W LED bulb produces up to 2,260 lumens with adjustable brightness
cons: Some buyers would like the lamp to be a little taller

customer_reviews.title: No overhead lights? Not a problem anymore!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Seriously though. This is incredible!! I've been debating if I should get a west elm sconce or this and I finally decided on this lamp and I have zero regrets!! Like many of you I live in New York in an apartment where there is lots of glass windows and zero overhead lighting. This lamp is a game changer!! 4 different brightness levels, totally solid, and so sleek you hardly notice it! I would for sure recommend. I included a before and after picture with the lamp on full strength and off.
customer_reviews.author: cape039

customer_reviews.title: Great minimal, sleek floor lamp for people who don't like floor lamps
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. We bought this one first to try out and see how we like it since we don't normally like floor lamp. Turned out this is a great lamp, minimal, sleek, and does a great job lighting our loft up without being too in your face. We bought two more after this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return both of these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps. Pros: light, sturdy, easy to set up, and the light is pretty good - bright with a warm glow Cons: Had to return both lamps because they would not remain on. After a few minutes they would shut off and then cycle on and off about every 3 minutes. Since both did the same thing I wonder how anyone is satisfied with the product. Also, the area around the switch on the pole was noticeable hot. Seems they both have bad switches. Quality control? Not much.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C. Pferdner

customer_reviews.title: fixed myself
customer_reviews.text: Dimmer switch does not work. It is super bright or off. The on/off button does not work either. Need to plug and unplug from the wall. Update: I took a knife and popped out the switch from the bottom. When I pulled the switch out, I noticed the sensor was no connected to the switch. They use a cheap adhesive tape to connect. I used epoxy and glued the sensor to the switch and popped it back on the lamp pole. Now it works. The type of light is like a hospital exam room. Even when dimmed, it is not a pleasant tone. Maybe good for the garage when you are working on something at night.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP2020

customer_reviews.title: Totally bogus claim of 3000 lumens
customer_reviews.text: Description claims 30 watts of LEDs with 3000 lumen output. Indeed if this was really 30 watts worth of LEDs, this should easily put out 3000 lumens, but it puts out less than half that. I compared this lamp with a 1600 lumen Fluxtronics LED light bulb and this poll light is clearly not as bright as the Fluxtronics bulb. Additionally, the colors of the various parts of the lamp with the antique brass finish are all over the map, with hardly any two having the same color.
customer_reviews.author: ASOK

customer_reviews.title: ... these in the last 6 months and was very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these in the last 6 months and was very pleased with the product, however, the last one I purchased malfunctioned and I am unable to reach the company for a resolution. The lamp worked well for a couple of weeks but the on and off switch stopped working. I'm wondering when the other two will malfunction. I bought the lamp because I needed a dimmable Lamp but what I have is a lamp that does not work. Don't buy from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Esperanca Moniz

customer_reviews.title: The light that failed
customer_reviews.text: The box looked like it was held together with tape,and the cardboard has no structural integrity. The box rattled,never a good sign. Was the box for the light. Everything was just laying in the box. If its supposed to be a bulb,its broken looks like fangs on a snake. The lens is cracked,and whatever is used as reflective material has about a quarter of it scraped off. Im easily amused,put it together and poof breakers break,the sound of arc welding floats throgh the air. Box will not make return trip,l dont drive because of my eyes being bad. HELP
customer_reviews.author: Fred Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp - when it works. The switch on mine started having problems within 24 hrs!!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, when it works. I had it less than 24 hrs and the switch stopped working exactly as stated in so many other reviews. The plug for the lamp head is also too short. The lamp came on again today but I'm returning it based on negative reviews. I like the design so much that I purchased another one (in another color) hoping for better luck. If the same thing happens it will go back as well. Very disappointed so far.
customer_reviews.author: djdidit

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my living room. I hate overhead lighting. I love it. 3 light settings. From bright to dim. It gives the room a warm glow. It stands about 5' 7". If you are tall then I suggest placing the lamp on something to give it height. I'm 5'5", so I never see the light source. I purchased 3 more and am about to purchase my 5 th lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Bil

customer_reviews.title: Rare lamp that light up the whole room.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the second unit for my living room after having a satisfactory experience with the first unit. I was looking for a lamp that can provide bright lights for my work at night without making me sleepy. This lamp exactly does that. What I like about this lamp: - It generates excellent amount light evenly covering my medium-size room and my living room - The light is white rather than warm orange light, which puts me into sleep - The LED produces minimal heat and consumes low energy - It has three dimming options
customer_reviews.author: M.D.C

customer_reviews.title: All you need to light up a small living room!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the Brighttech Sky LED Torchiere lamp. It's all you need to light up a small-medium size living room. It has 3 settings, I normally just use the middle settings which is perfect. I like the way you can tilt the light towards the wall and the light bounces off of it. I only wish it had one lower dim settings for when watching movies on my big flat screen tv to balance out the light. All in all I'm am happy with my purchase including the fact that it is all LED which will save me electric costs at the end. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Dimming function is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This thing is useless as a floor lamp in a TV room as it only has "super bright", "almost super bright" and "off". It should be described as "two levels of bright light and incapable of achieving soft/ambient level of ". It's been over a month since I bought it and the box is long gone so returning it is likely not an option. Don't be duped by the product description and great reviews. This thing is a piece of junk, unless you're looking for searchlight brightness, caause that's all you'll get out of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but a little too short
customer_reviews.text: Even though you have a lot of flexibility for angling the light, due to it's height you are forced to just keep it pointed upright or away from what you really want lit up. I am 5' 10" and if you don't have it pointed straight up at the ceiling or away from the main part of the room, it blinds you. It would be even worse for taller people. It's a sturdy product, but unless you want to be seeing spots for a while they really should make the rod a bit taller.... Alternatively you could just never look at the corner of the room that this light is in.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Moore

customer_reviews.title: Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: I have a total of 5 lights from Brightech. I love their desk lights so i figured i would buy several floor lights. Well the quality is not there. It almost seems like someone else made the lights. One of the metal tubes that you screw to one anther would not allow me to screw all the way down. So basically there is a gap and there is no way to put all the parts back in the box for a return. I would stay away from this and all models that require you to screw the 4 metal tubes together. Stick to the desk lights as they are amazing. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bronsno976

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to be an electrician when buying this product
customer_reviews.text: This arrive next day. I wasssss So happy My son in law happened to be over So asked him to put together It didn’t work I was so upset. Did a lot of research and felt Brightech had a good rep But unfortunately The wires inside lamp pole was cut in half Hence better be an electrician To fix a broken product So disappointed in this company I heard they ship out used or broken Products but this lamp had sooo many stars Will they get one star You can’t trust anyone anymore So not worth the 70.00 price tag
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Lamp costs more than double what it's actually worth
customer_reviews.text: This gets one star because it died after a few months. Here's my review from when it worked: The brightness settings were not helpful for us. This was in our baby's nursery, and we needed some dimmer optio s for when we came to feed or change the baby at night. The lowest setting was WAY too bright. I wish there were a way to go back a setting rather than having to cycle through the brightest settings to get back to lower light when you accidentally went one too far.
customer_reviews.author: Deuces

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm greatly disappointed in the brightness level. On high beam I still need other lamps to fully light my small living room. The head does not pivot around enough and I cannot point light the way I thought I would be able to do. The stand sections keep unthreading and have to tightened on as weekly basis EVEN THOUGH NO ONE IS MOVING IT OR MESSING WITH IT! The touch switch is great though. After putting it in my living room, I realized how ugly it is. LOL it's just a stick with a flat plate on top of it! Waaaaaaaay too expensive for how low the brightness level is! Can't recommend it at all because of this last point.
customer_reviews.author: Look4Deals

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so bright and amazing... I am so happy that I purchased it. We have a large bedroom with no ceiling lights at all - we had one lamp in the corner that is so ridiculous - you get more light opening the shades than you do from that lamp. So when I purchased this lamp I was so hopeful that it would solve our lighting dilemma and it did!!! The other lamp cowers in the corner when I turn this Brightech on... actually don't even know why we turn on the other one because it does nothing. Thank you for this great lamp!! So happy to be able to read in our bedroom again!!
customer_reviews.author: K. WONG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this without a specific use in mind. As soon as I plugged it in to try it out, the indirect light transformed my dim dining room--so I haven't moved it since! It is light, has a small footprint and is very decorative, so I expect to use it for multiple places and occasions. Very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Psyche dropping seeds

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this lamp is incredible ! I just got mine, n I simply can't believe what it can do. It literally lights up the whole room ! I was unpacking it, n thought to myself, there's nothing to it. Turned it on, n WOW. I must say, I'm very happy I bought it. I just hope it last, as well as it lights up a room. There's 3 light settings. Yes, I would buy it again, it deserves 5 stars and maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great area lamp
customer_reviews.text: The 3 position touch lamps don't really exist any more. This puts out as much light as the old bulb or halogen lamps. I also like that it is energy efficient with LEDs. The adjustable swivel top is nice as well. I'm going to grab a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory quality very inconsistent, three of these all with different color temperatures
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: All three are DIFFERENT color temperatures, two at least remotely look similar. Turned out the less bright, more yellow one is the more typical one.. although who knows, production quality very inconsistent. I opted to buy a second one a week later from the same Amazon listing and the second one has a much more yellow color temperature than the first. Going to order a third and return whatever doesn't match. Kind of a hassle. Hoping the second is a defect because it is really yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: THREE SETTINGS FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS!
customer_reviews.text: Love that even I could assemble it(I am terrible at assembling). The bedroom is the brightest it has ever been. The sensor is so sensitive that all you have to do is lightly touch it, not even press. Love that it has three settings, crucial if you share the bedroom and the other party wants to sleep while you read. Only negative is that you have to be very careful not to pull at it or push it because it’s thin and lightweight. So DO get up out of bed to use it, don’t try to pull it towards you to change the setting. All in all, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: big sis

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! READ BEFORE YOU BUY- POSSIBLE FIRE HAZARS
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this lamp for 4 months now, i love how bright and thin it is but the main problem is THE ADAPTER OVERHEATS. It was connected to my amazon plug and it kept turning it off due to overheating, today i removed the adapter and guess what? It flipped and KILLED my breaker, now I don’t have power in half of my house it will cost me a lot to have an electrician do the repair, it gets so hot it smells like melting plastic. So upset because I love this lamp but I cannot trust it, it’s either the lamp or my house, not to mention the fire hazard due to overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius

customer_reviews.title: My dark craft room is ablaze with new light!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is absolutely the best! The design is basic, modern, and unobtrusive. It takes up a small footprint. Best of all it is a blazing beacon of sunlight! I am so enamored with this, I ordered a second one. One was sufficient, but two changed the whole profile of my craft room. I pitched two Ott lights as they paled by comparison. Best purchases I've made in a long time. Everyone who comes over I drag into that room to marvel with me over the change. Have convinced my crafting buddies to make similar purchases. Seeing is believing. Spectacular lights!
customer_reviews.author: creativelady

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was easy enough to assemble. It's light weight (maybe too much). I feel the base should be heavier to avoid it from tipping over on carpet. The power switch is funky and not user friendly. Sometimes it's super sensitive to touch and other times it's not. It also seems a bit flimsy. I can see that part having issues. Also, the power adaptor is large and clunky. Not sure who thought of this design, but it's a huge fail. It barely fits into a surge protector and would never fit behind a piece of furniture. Very poor design. I think for the price, it's not worth the money. It should be around 39.99 and not a penny over.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS STATED, QUALITY and EASY TO ASSEMBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Everything mentioned in the headline. It has 3 light settings, lightweight, yet sturdy. Hopefully the LED lights will last for years, because you cannot replace (unfortunately, our disposable world). The simplicity of this lamp is what I love as a minimalist. Bright on high, mood on low and good in medium settings. I would be surprised if anyone criticizes this lamp if everything was correct in it's delivery. Electronics can be temperamental, so if you get a bad return for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Jung

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and no bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is awful. I was really disappointed with the fact that it does not dim nearly as dark as a halogen floor lamp. In addition, the top of the lamp does not tilt to show off the design. It’s overpriced and poorly designed. After more research, I ordered a halogen floor lamp because I will get more light selection choices including an excellent dimmer function. Don’t waste your money. I returned this item and I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ChicaDesi

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The description states the light is equivalent to a 200 W bulb. It is NOT. Not even close. Although it is easy to assemble and energy efficient, I bought it for the 200-W brightness. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Day Veaster

customer_reviews.title: Switch failed after 35 days
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and knew there was a risk of early failure but hoped I would be one of the lucky ones. I was not. 35 days after receiving this lamp the switch failed and it will no longer turn on. I will be trying to rewire it to bypass the switch but have not done that yet. It was the perfect lamp for my sewing room to provide background lighting. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CLawson

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it didn't last
customer_reviews.text: (*) UPDATE: Switch short-circuited after only seven (7) months. Now all the light does is blink rapidly on/off/on/off endlessly. Very Disappointed! Easy to assemble - check adjustable light (power) settings - check Appears to be high quality - could be better - and not very "fancy" Head of lamp position adjustable - pretty limited. The angle of adjustment is negligible.
customer_reviews.author: JMeir

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting in dark room
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light for my bedroom which does not have an overhead fixture. I have purchased lamps and floor lights and they either did not provide good light or stopped working. When I purchased this light, I was hoping for success in lighting the room. I am not disappointed. I purchased the white because my room is beige with white trim and I wanted something that would not distract from furnishings. The lighting is awesome. I have it set towards the ceiling and the entire room has light. Thank you for this product. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Switch defective -- stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Switch stopped working after a couple of weeks and returned it. I was hoping it would be brighter as I was wanting to make my office super bright for winter. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AGuyinBend

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is amazing
customer_reviews.text: First - the light it gives off is pleasant and easy to adjust from soft to bright. (Actually, it's incredibly fun how you just slide your hand over the button and the light changes) Second - the lamp is a beautiful design that doesn't take up space or block wall art (in my case) and is modern and clean. Lastly - it was incredibly easy to put together once I got passed a completely stuck point. Hard to explain, but I wish they had included more explicit instructions for dummies like me on the direction this one piece had to go. Overall delighted with my purchase and the price for it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Golden

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp replaced a 300-watt conventional torchiere floor lamp that gave up the ghost after many years of good service. This LED one is as tall but not as "beefy" as the last one. Time will tell if it is as rugged.We like the soft-touch switch and must say, to our surprise, the light seems to be as bright on the highest setting as the one it replaced. I am sure that the electricity saved will be a big plus, too, and we have been converting every light/lamp in the house over to LEDs for the last couple of year as the old conventional bulbs die. All in all, couldn't be happier with this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, modern and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews and pictures will tell you all about how good it looks, but I want to point out that it's every bit as bright as the 2,260 lumens it advertises. That's more than bright enough to light a 700 sq ft room. It works well with a wireless switch and there's seemingly no side effects from using one. The dimming setting can be confusing. It starts off at its brightest, then drops down until it's off. Going to see how this pans out after a couple years, but expecting good things from it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V.

customer_reviews.title: one bulb stop workng
customer_reviews.text: After using this LED lamp for a very short time, the lower bulb stopped working. This lower light is the one I use for my close work. Now it is almost useless to me. I expected it to last 20 years as stated, or at least a few years. Unfortunately, there is no way to replace the bulb or do any repair.
customer_reviews.author: mady

customer_reviews.title: A fine little lamp
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, I found the apparent flimsiness of the lamp to be a source of concern but one assembly was completed (despite the bewildering instructions not compiled by a native speaker of English or any other language), my concerns evaporated. A stable, solid lamp that provides excellent illumination. While I tend to use it as an “on/off” lamp by a remote control on the power plug, I am not sure how the lamp’s own switch would stand up over time. On balance, very happy with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. E. S. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Touch button quality was bad
customer_reviews.text: The lamp switch doesn't work, so I have to o turn it on by plugging it in on the outlet. the connection broke on the switch, so the light goes in and out unless it's at the perfect angle. I love the lamp when it worked for 2 days and tried to return it but threw out the box and now am stuck with it. It lights up the room great and I understand the reviews but be weary the quality wasn't as expected. With all the options out there, thinking this was the one, and pricing myself on finding the best I wish I could have spent my money on something else that didn't fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: maarten

customer_reviews.title: try out the product before you transport it to another location
customer_reviews.text: This item was never checked for quality control. The product was defective and it wasted 3 hours of my time. I live in NYC and had to bring via subway to a client's apartment. I proceeded to assemble and realized the product was defective. I have to drag this lamp back through the subway system and organize the return. Terrible quality control... any novice who actually looked at the product would have realized it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t k ow how other people are able to light a room with this. Maybe my expectations were different as I’m using in an office. Very disappointed I missed the return date because it took way too long to figure out how to get it back in its packaging:-( Not happy at all and it’s so expensive. Truly money thrown away and not able to return as my husband and I finally got the packing together today, a day AFTER the return window because it took two to figure out;-(
customer_reviews.author: Mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: "Gives off Zero Heat"....uh...no, an ok lamp but too bright
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is ok...though as others have expressed, it's a bit too 'white' and not warm. Also, the most "dim" setting is very bright...forget about romantic settings. The implied "zero heat" from the video is completely false. With a laser thermometer, I got 114F on the base at full brightness running after 30 minutes. That's not as bad as halogen, but please...don't say "zero heat" in the video. It's warm folks...very warm. On the upside, assembly was easy and the thing works. I wish it were 1' higher because as you walk around the room, it shines in your face. It needs one of those upward facing shields.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: This is the first LED floor lamp I purchased. I used traditional bulbs one before, and those can't light the whole room. I also purchase another 2000 lumen one (this one is 2190 I believe), it doesn't seem lots of different on the number but I can tell this one is brighter than the other. The good thing with this item is that I can face it toward the wall so I won't directly see the light source.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Liao

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Be clear, these are basically great items. 1. Too short, only 5 1/2' so you see the LED'S as you walk into the room. 2. Would be better if more light. I have vaulted ceilings and was replacing 200W Halogens, 2500 lumens would be better. 3. Light color is superb, nice incandescent warm white color. 4. Very easy assembly, look very good in my living room 5. Well packaged, perfect condition. 6. Arrived 2 days after order on Amazon 7. A reflector to direct the light upwards would be great, they basically send light 180° from the top. 8. The LED'S are low voltage so there is a power transformer to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Knife Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good but too short
customer_reviews.text: Bought for apartment living room because there was no light fixture. Lamp is bright enough to light up living room to my expectations. One thing I didn't like is that the lamp is too short, I can see the top of the lamp when I am standing making it annoying because it's as if I'm looking directly at the light. It also feels a bit cheaper for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Updated 02/10/20. This lamp lasted less than a year. Several of the LED lights no longer work, and it is about as bright as a 40 watt bulb. Very disappointed. Original review: Lamp is easy to assemble, and gives off a bright, attractive light that can illuminate the entire room. The only thing I don't like about it is the on/off dimmer switch. It works almost like a touchpad, not an actual switch -- once for brightest, twice for medium, etc. It often seems to register more than one touch, so I have to cycle thru again to get it brightest. Maybe I'll get used to it. Other than that, it is a great lamp.
customer_reviews.author: N. JENNINGS

customer_reviews.title: I loved this thing from the ease of assembly to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to order one. We just purchased a home with zero overhead lights in 90% of the rooms. Our table lamps weren't cutting it and the post 2000's torchiere lamps are a joke compared to what we had "back in the day". I loved this thing from the ease of assembly to the way I was able to control the light in the room. I jumped back on and ordered 3 more! These are actually better than overhead lighting. Yeah, sort of a pain that the dimmer resets when turned off, but it is a small price to pay for these sleek and powerful lights!
customer_reviews.author: Indyanna

customer_reviews.title: de light full.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a third one of these floor lamps for my living area. The head can be adjusted so I can bounce the light off of the ceiling or wall, and direct the amount of light by adjusting the intensity. They are not super bright but serve us nicely. They have a slender footprint, light weight, easy to put together, and are LED so efficient. A big improvement over our former octopus lamps. I am pleased. I may buy more from this company for other rooms. We are ridding ourselves of the old fashion floor lamps we've enjoyed in the past, with lamp shades etc but now prefer lighter weight, more manageable LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: Granny101

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice -- Bright
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth LED lamp from Brightech.... all different. I bought two for my parents, I have one in my office, and yet a different one in my dining area. They're all very nice quality. The only thing I'll warn you about is this is indeed VERY bright, even on its lowest dimness. It works perfectly in my office.... but it was definitely too bright for my Living Room as a "fill" light (which, to be honest, is where I was going to put it initially). With the caveat that this really is more for an area to be brightly lit, I recommend this heartily.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Gives really nice light
customer_reviews.text: We have a primary light in our living room (ceiling fan with four bulb fixture) but in the evenings we don't like having such a harsh light right in the middle of the room. This lamp is perfect because it provides plenty of warm light (not white) and we also like the touch switch for easy toggle through the three levels of brightness as well as on/off. Because it's LED there's no heat and because it doesn't have a bowl and bulb like traditional torchiere lamps, there also no bugs. As described you can angle the head to bounce light in whatever direction you want or just aim it straight up. So far we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up, great brightness & light tone
customer_reviews.text: From the box to plugged in and working, it took me just a couple of minutes to assemble. The light is absolutely wonderful. All three brightness levels are easy on the eyes. There's a simple elegance to it, and it can go in just about any room in the house. The wide top surface + covered bottom means the room is illuminated by reflection, rather than a direct light source, which is perfect for what I wanted. (Now that I think of it, someone taller may disagree, as the light is about my height--5' 3"--and someone just a couple of inches taller may be bothered by being able to see the lit top surface.)
customer_reviews.author: L. Rothermel

customer_reviews.title: Color is a problem
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark bronze lamp. The lamp I got said dark bronze on the box. It was definitely not dark bronze - it was silver. I returned it, and amazon sent a replacement. AGAIN, dark bronze on the box, but the lamp is silver. I gave up as I needed a lamp. Obviously Amazon does not do a quality check, and the manufacturer does not know what dark bronze is. The lamp gives good light, but it does not compliment the color scheme in the room. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SafariGuy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy Any Irreplaceable Lamp Light Product...
customer_reviews.text: I felt compelled to write a couple lines to alert others about this product. I purchased this on February 2, 2019 for $70.00 along with additional costs for taxes. Today, June 29. 2020 it died. What a misguided purchase. I read the description which stated in effect the lighting would last forever, given the fact the lights are not replaceable blah blah. Ok, I’ve done my due diligence in possibly saving others that won’t make the same mistake as I did. Don’t Bother.... P.S. Also the light did not illuminate the room, it primarily only provided light where the stand was positioned....
customer_reviews.author: R.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Lights up my dark living room
customer_reviews.text: I should've got one of these sooner! The lighting in my living room plain sucks and I only had the overhead and a table lamp. This lamp brightens it nicely - I place it in a corner and also bought another one of these (the one with the 4000k and 5000k option just if i wanted a more white light and placed it in the other corner). The mood is nice. Soft warm light though sometimes I feel the highest setting strains my eyes sometimes? I like that there are 3 levels of brightness depending on what mood you want. It's simple and modern. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Sealed With a Kiss J.

customer_reviews.title: Five-star replacement for circline fluorescent floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that this unit replaced an older torchiere lamp which used two Circline fluorescent tubes with a three-way switch to give three levels of brightness. The expense of replacement bulbs and a growing lack of confidence in the rotary switch lead to the replacement decision. The Brightech lamp assembled easily. It's lightweight, provides three levels of illumination, is thriftier to operate and provides the slightly warm light that I prefer. The design of the top provides more protection against airborne dust and debris which I consider a big plus! One swipe with a cloth and you're done!
customer_reviews.author: John F. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Description needs work, not as bright as expected, but still great
customer_reviews.text: The product description seems to have multiple specs and I would say that this would be more accurately like 1600 lumens at its brightest, not the 2260 it claims. Warm ness would probably be around 2700K which was accurate. Energy efficiency was kind of bad considering there are 10 watt bulbs available that can do the same level of lighting as this 30 watt lamp. Ultimately though, I love the design, love how it’s touch and also has 3 different brightnesses. Just know that this model will only come with yellow light and to find a whiter light, look for something with a higher kelvin. For pure white light, search for 5000k.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp! I really like the sleek design and durability! The whole assembly is very easy! I also like different brightness modes! It is perfect for lighting up my whole bedroom and you can tilt the head to angle the light as well. Another great feature is that the top of the lamp were the bulbs are does not ever get hot no matter how long you have the lamp on! This lamp is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought four!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an older apartment with no ceiling lights outside of the kitchen/bathrooms, and these have been a lifesaver!! Just one will brighten up a whole room. They're also very sleek and attractive - I bought the silver and you really barely notice them. I originally bought one for my family room, but now I've bought a second for the family room and two more for my office. After buying the first two, I also tried another light by this maker but I didn't love it as much as this one. After that purchase, the seller also sent a 10% off coupon which I used to buy the last two right away. Love this brand and product!
customer_reviews.author: bw2014

customer_reviews.title: LED failure after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Died after some months. Several LEDs either went out entirely or started flickering, creating a maddening horror movie effect. The lamp stayed completely stationary since I got it, so it didn't sustain any shock or damage. I suspect electrical continuity, but I don't find the device very "user serviceable".
customer_reviews.author: John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: My heart is broken
customer_reviews.text: I have to give a low rating because it is not working anymore after only a few months. The light keeps flashing and does nothing else. So disapointed because I was raving about this lamp for months to my family and friends plus I think it looks cool and is sooooooo bright!!!!! My heart is broken.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not bright
customer_reviews.text: States it can be used as the only source of light in the room. It's so dull! Even with ceiling lights and another lamp, it's not bright enough. Update: 5/26/20: a year and a half later, the lamp tripped and caused the whole room’s outlets to not work. Wow. We couldn’t figure out what was tripping it but when we took out the lamp, everything worked again. Hazardous!
customer_reviews.author: smyl4me56

customer_reviews.title: Flickering After Almost Year
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in May 2018. It's now April 2019 and it started flickering last week for no apparent reason. Before this, it worked great and was happy with it. It's supposed to last 20 years and has a three-year warranty. I'm not sure how to send it back because it's not like I still have the box. I sent them an email, let's see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Steven512

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't provide that much light
customer_reviews.text: I've used this light in a couple of different rooms for about a year. It's lightweight, easy on the energy, and reasonably stylish. The problem is, it really doesn't light up a room very well. In comparison, my old three-way torch style lamp with replaceable LED bulbs is much brighter. I'm here today shopping for something more servicable.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinth

customer_reviews.title: Okay but the wall gets hot
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is not as bright as I had hoped. The on switch does not work anymore so I have to put the plug into the wall socket to turn it on or off. My big complaint is that the wall plug gets very hot to the touch and that makes me worried. I don't know how safe this lamp is and I don't use it for long periods of time. I will day it was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy for good stories

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!  Definitely got my money’s worth!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely blown away by this lamp. I bought it because it had a high star rating, but I was still a bit skeptical. But when it arrived and I assembled it, I understood why so many ranked it highly. It adjusts dimness by touch so no little knobs to accidentally break off. The light is really bright at its brightest. It doesn’t make any humming noise and the out of the box put together was quick and easy. It is so much more stylish than old halogen lamps! I’m trying to figure out where I can put another one in my house. I would definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Novia Plummer

customer_reviews.title: good floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these now in different colors (White / Nickel / Bronze / Gunmetal Black) to match decor of each room. I installed ceiling fans in all my bedrooms in my house and did not purchase a light option due to ceiling to floor clearance issues. The lamp does a very good job of lighting up these ~11-ft. X 14-ft. bedrooms plugged into the room switched wall outlet. Pros; (1) extremely easy to assemble (2) sturdy on hardwood flooring (3) quality manufacturing (4) finish is excellent...highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: fargozombie

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Solution for a Dark Room
customer_reviews.text: We needed a lighting solution for a Cathedral Ceiling living area, the existing lamps left our room dull. Then I found Brightech's Torchieres. They are excellent - easy to assemble LED bounce the light off the ceiling and what's more they are adjustable (3 settings - very bright, regular, low) working well to give the room a nice ambiance, depending on situation. The only downside is that they are a little lightweight. The stand is not quite heavy enough, so kids and pets can knock over if they bump into them. However, as there's no glass in the construction, this is not a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brightness quoted in the description is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Description says the LED gives light equivalent in luminosity to a 200watt incandescent lamp. It does not. It is described as providing 2260 lumens. My 1800 lumen Ikea Ledare LED bulb produces much more light than this LED. Only reason I purchased the Sky LED was because Ikea stopped selling the 1800 lumen Ledare. If you want a spectacular (meaning really bright and excellent color temperature) LED lighting experience, persuade Ikea to return the 1800 lumen Ledare to its inventory.
customer_reviews.author: PDQ

customer_reviews.title: not reliable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this slim-lined lamp one year and 3 months ago for $79 and it completely stopped working. I have two floor lamps that I purchased for $19.99 from Kmart 6years ago that I still use in my bedroom. Waste of money for a lamp I hardly used and thought would last for a while. I do not recommend this to anyone for the price $79
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’m an IT professional and on a computer nearly 100% of my day in a school. They are very bright fluorescent lights. Since purchasing this light for my office I no longer suffer problems with my eyes/vision nir do I get the occasional late afternoon headaches. I only thought the bright lights to be very annoying. I never thought it to be the cause of my dry eyes and eventual semi double vision by the end of the day, especially when looking at smaller print. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp that looks good and just works. Easy to project the light where you need it in your room. Clean, well made and sturdy lamp. Kudos on the environmentally friendly packaging, no box of styrofoam for a change. Easy to assemble. Only wish was a version with a slidable dimming feature was made vs. the 3 selectable levels. Other comment - couldn’t the wire been routed out of the bottom of the base vs. where the bottom of the light pole where it attaches to the base? Hide the cord all the way down. Still - have give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: stevebhm

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I turned it on the first time. It lit up my entire living room. I was looking for something powerful enough since I dont have overhead lighting and this does the job. The dimmer settings are also very handy. It is pretty sturdy, my 14 month old has shaken it but diesnt seen like it would tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Cheikh N.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of “up lights” in my lifetime. (This is my 2nd one from this co). So, I’d have to say this is one of the best ones, for the following reasons. I like that the light is a warm white light color, instead of one of those odd looking unnatural, white light fixtures. Also, it’s extremely easy to assemble and most importantly, the packaging is very environmentally friendly. Very little plastic wrap and no nasty Styrofoam. Yay! Thank you for being conscientious about the packaging, for the planet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joanne H.

customer_reviews.title: should have read the description better
customer_reviews.text: I found it was easy to assemble this lamp but I agree with other individuals about the height of the lamp which could be about 4 inches taller. Alas, I wasn't careful when I read the description of the illumination. Looking at the provided pictures was a bit deceiving. It showed a lamp that produced a very bright daylight illumination but when I turned it on, it was more like soft white. I should have paid more attention to the description rather than the photos. Please remove the photos because it isn't representative of the kind of illumination it actually produces
customer_reviews.author: s shen

customer_reviews.title: It’s A Darn Good Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed by this lamp. When the lamp arrived, it took 10 minutes from in a sealed box to totally assembled and plugged in. The light it produces is both bright and pleasantly warm- which can be a bit tricky to get from LED lights. The lamp itself is unobtrusive (I know that sounds like a weird positive note, but I want light, not an eyesore) and fairly sturdy for its design type. All in all, I’m happy with it and plan on buying more to replace our other floor lamps. If you’ve ever seen Parks and Rec, Ron Swanson would approve of this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Indoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp that doesn't look like one.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something in our front room that could put off some light. Most lamps seemed to dim to get the job done. We have a ceiling fan with a lamp inside of it but it basically does nothing but make the room look "dim". I like the fact that it has three settings and gives off great light. I just ordered another to have a matching pair. It's nice and slim and looks attractive without looking like a floor lamp. Easy to assemble. Only down side is that the light does appear a bit LEDish. Nothing blue just not like the reveal lightbulbs that I like that give off a more natural light.
customer_reviews.author: Squeakermama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match the hype
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a condo that does not have ceiling lights. This lamp was touted as being a substitute for ceiling lights, as it purportedly bounces light off the ceiling and mimics the effect. Thus, I bought two of these, and planned to buy two more if they panned out. Sadly, they do not. While they do give very nice indirect light, they are insufficent for totally lighting an entire bedroom (of modest 11x12 ft. size). I fact, except for its rather sleek and attractive appearance, it's just like any other torchere lamp that can be had for half the price. I'll keep and find a use for the two I have, but won't buy any more.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this back in my college days! Those poorly lit dorm rooms would have been a little more bearable. I have mine hooked up to a switched outlet and have no issues so far. My bedroom is about 200 sqft and it illuminates the whole room when angled accordingly. That said, I probably should have gotten two of them rather than just angling the lap outward. As others have said, the lamp is juuuust a little bit short for me. I am over 6'2 and when I look into the corner of the room, I stare right into the LEDs. Really that is my only gripe, but it is not an issue for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for our living room. I will admit that I based the decision solely on price. After getting the lamp and putting it together, which was a breeze, I realized just how much light it puts out. So I bought two more of them for the Colorado house living room. I still need one more for the Colorado house, but the room will be as bright as daylight with the third one in the room. Much better than the indirect fluorescent lighting that's in there now! Hopefully Brightech will offer lamp heads as replacement parts for the day when the LEDs finally start to fail. That's really my only concern with this light.
customer_reviews.author: D Ferree

customer_reviews.title: does what I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: With COVID, I had to suddenly develop a home office for telemedicine visits, and I needed more light in the corner of the room I use. This light feels natural (no nasty fluorescent headachy feeling), and I love that it has 3 settings. I usually the highest or second highest (brightest) setting. It hardly takes up any room and is very easy to move around. I also like that it reflects the light off the wall/ceiling so you don't have glare or shadows. If I could add one feature I would make the height adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: it's ok, but looks a little cheap & incompatible with switch outlets
customer_reviews.text: originally bought to be my primary floor lamp in my living area based on some of the pictures. looked very sleek/elegant and taller than it is in the photos. got it and was a little disappointed as it looks a bit cheaper in person, but it's good in terms of function/light, and the brightest and dim settings are at an appropriate level for me. i'm 6'1" so i need to tilt the top away from me to looking straight in to the light at times. not sure if i'll keep it, but i'm using it as a secondary lamp that lights my balcony from inside for now.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with a wall light switch operated socket!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is great when it’s on and working, but my one star review is because it doesn’t work properly when plugged into a socket operated by a wall switch, and they don’t tell you this in the description. We’ve found that if it’s at the dim or medium setting when turning off the wall switch it never comes back on when the switch is turned on. It works with the wall switch sometimes when it’s at the brightest setting. It’s very common to plug these lamps into a wall switch, so this should have been disclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new light that generated less heat and used up less juice. This one is perfect for that! Easy to assemble, well packaged when shipped. The soft touch button is at a good sensitivity level. The bright setting is great for when we're eating dinner or doing something in the room, the dimmer 2 settings are good for when we're hanging out or watching TV. The pivoting head is nice so you can easily direct the light around the room. great purchase, will get another down the road just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, stylish light highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these sleek lights for my family room with no overhead lighting. The room is pretty dark after the morning sun shifts so I needed something that could really brighten the room up. These lit up the room exactly how I had wanted them to in my mind's eye. These lights are slim and do not take up much space, which was something else I needed. They are dimmable too so if you want low lighting this light has you covered! So far I am very pleased. I will update the review in 6-8 months if anything changes. I cannot comment on the longevity of these lights. I have only had them for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying plastic cover produces a ring of light
customer_reviews.text: The light from my prior torchiere lights came from being reflected on the walls and ceiling. This torchiere has a plastic cover over the LEDs that glows a ring of light around the top edge of the lamp. It is in my field of vision and hurts my eyes. It reflects off the TV screen. I called tech support and they did not have a way or recommend removing the plastic cover. I will be returning this and look for a more traditional design. I did like the 4 step dimmer (3 light settings and off).
customer_reviews.author: WKRP

customer_reviews.title: Very bright with a minimal "visual footprint"
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is great. It's easy to assemble, straightforward to use, and it takes up very little visual space. It's very bright with a nice white light, and the three levels of brightness are useful for changing the lighting throughout the day. I haven't noticed any flickering at the lower brightness levels, which is something I've seen in other LED lights. I liked the first one so much that I bought another a few days later. One of the nicest features of this in my mind is that the disc at the top holding the LEDs is a smooth translucent plastic, which makes it very easy to wipe down and clean relative to other lamps.
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: Powerful LED lamps!
customer_reviews.text: We use these at our office for 10+ hours every single day. I thought they were a little pricey for what the are, but I would purchase them again now after using them for a month or so. They produce little to NO heat, even after being on all day. They are plenty bright enough to illuminate our office, which has no windows, and they produce a nice color temperature as well. The swivel heads on them also allowed us to place the lamps in corners, and aim the light up and against the wall to illuminate the entire room easily.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light with a nice design.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my husband for his man cave. Even though it is a cave he likes it to be bright but we don’t have ceiling electricity there. No standing lamps have given him the desirable brightness before. So we decided to try this one and he is so happy! The room we use it in is a small one and this lamp is completely enough to light the whole room. Also because of its slim design, it fits perfectly and doesn’t take much space. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "IMPRESSIVE "
customer_reviews.text: I received my lamp this morning and the setup is very simplistic. The time it takes to come on is fine! Don't be thrown off by what anyone has written about it. Its lighting settings are good, I honestly was amazed how much of an area was lite up even on low! The brightness is easy on your eyes even if you turn it on in the middle of the night! As of now I am very impressed and glad I brought it. I have paid much more for other lamps that were nowhere near as nice! Its very elegant and takes far less space than other lamps!!
customer_reviews.author: mike Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Expected higher energy efficiency
customer_reviews.text: The LEDs are cool as described, but I was surprised to find out that the transformer gets hot and draws 1.5 amps. At 120 v. that comes to 180 watts, three times the energy draw of the lamp I replaced it with, which was just as bright. The main reason I replaced the other one was it was leaning to the side by 5-10 degrees. I'm considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gensler

customer_reviews.title: Pefect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp for the living room in my one bedroom apartment. I was inspired by the minimal design and it seemed perfect fit for my needs. The construction is sturdy and it is bright enough to shine my apartment(bounced light as you can tell by the design). It has three different bright setting and I change them for my need(watching TV or work at my desk). When I turn on the light, It takes about couple of seconds to light itself but it does not bother me at all. If you are into minimal design and wanted to have some nice touch for your room/office, try this one.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Best floor lamp ever.
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutly nothing that I don't like about this lamp. I struggled for several years to find a floor lamp that was bright enough to light a room with the ability to dim it. This lamp sits on the carpet, and it sits perfectly straight. Most floor lamps that screw together leans and looks terrible. This lamp is both funtionable and good looking. It is bright enough to light a good size room and the head tilts to direct light how you want it. My wife was sceptical when I ordered it, and now she is a believer. Well done Brightech.
customer_reviews.author: TERRANCE GODFREY

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for an office or bedroom, but not living room.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in a room of size 12.5' x 15.5' and it lights the room up pretty well. You can tilt the head to angle it to a particular direction. The top the lamp is a piece of flat plastic, so you can wipe it clean when it gets dusty. It's lightweight, looks appealing, uses LED, and does a great job brightening the room. I wish they make LED floor lamp that can replace my halogen floor lamp. I tried to use this lamp in my living room and it's not giving off enough brightness. But still, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nibble

customer_reviews.title: A great lamp for our family room!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 55 inch HDTV in our family room. I have been using a halogen light (300 watt) that shines upward to light the room and eliminate reflections and glare while watching TV. I wanted to replace it with something that wouldn't use the electricity of the 300 watt lamp. The Brightech Sky LED Torchiere Super Bright Floor Lamp turns out to be perfect. Very bright but adjustable from full brightness to medium to low using LEDs that use much less energy. Just tapping the switch changes the brightness. A great lamp at a reasonable price and it fits in any kind of décor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is over heating by the on switch and the light is turning off and on by itself. I reached out to the company and no one is getting back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Works but similar lights with more features exist at same price band
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this one for bedroom. It works but 2 days later another similar product also arrived which had remote control, color changing and better light output. This product seems dated and poor in features. Would have returned but by the has discarded packaging. For the same price if you are getting remote, color changing options not just different colors but within yellow and white range and better light out put, I would suggest order the more featured and current product then this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha T

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid bright lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great indirect lamp, with a nice touch feature. It's very handy for us, as the lamp is behind the sectional, so the touch feature makes it considerably easier to use. The lights (we have two) are bright, with an even lighting pattern. It was not entirely clear to us, but the head pivots, so you can adjust the throw of the light as desired. The only negative I can come up with is that the dark bronze is a bit lighter than expected, but that may also just be the color saturation of the computer screen. Hard to beat for the money, we'll probably buy a couple more for the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy traveling fool

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright, But Not Durable.
customer_reviews.text: This item was very bright, and the light was warm. I truly truly loved it. However, slightly over a month, it would not light up anymore. I noticed before the power cord was hot all the time which really concerned me. It is a shame I had to throw it away. I hope other people got a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Yang

customer_reviews.title: great products at the right price
customer_reviews.text: have problems with my dimmer switch when i try to reach the company they are out to lunch or any other place i am changing my rating from 5 stars to zero i'd write more but why waste my time
customer_reviews.author: jimmy smash

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bright!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. VERY bright and has three settings to adjust brightness. I keep it at the lowest setting, the first one is bright enough to suit anyone's needs. Bright enough to light up an average sized room, not an entire ball room but a decent sized living room no problem. No issues out of the box as others have mentioned. Completely satisfied with this product. 5 mins to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

product_meta.title: Brightech Sky LED Torchiere Super Bright Floor Lamp - Contemporary, High Lumen Light for Living Rooms & Offices - Dimmable, Indoor Pole Uplight for Bedroom Reading - Black
feature_bullets: SUPER BRIGHT LIGHTING ~150 W EQUIVALENT LED TORCH LAMP LIGHTS UP A WHOLE ROOM - Do you want very bright light without expensive or harsh fixtures? The Brightech Sky torche lamp packs a very high 2190 lumens (at 3000K warm white), enough to light a large room. Its head easily pivots and shines light in any direction that you need it.

MODERN CORNER LAMP IS 3-WAY DIMMABLE - NEW MEMORY FUNCTION SAVES BRIGHTNESS SETTING FOR NEXT TIME: The Sky matches modern, minimalist, urban, casual and contemporary décor. The pole lamp fits easily in corners and the base slides under sofas. New: This uplight pole lamp's 3 way built in dimmer now remembers your brightness setting for the next time you turn it on and works with wall switches.

20 YEAR LIFE LEDs SAVE ENERGY - GET HIGH BRIGHTNESS, NOT HIGH WATTAGE: These LEDs are rated to last 20 years (assuming 3 hours use/day) because they don't waste energy like halogen, CFL and incandescent bulbs. Instead of halogen lamps burning 200 - 300 watts, the Brightech Sky draws a mere 26 watts. And you don't need to replace any bulb because the light is integrated. The LEDs' color temperature is 3,000K warm white. Save money with the Brightech Sky.

BRIGHTECH'S HEAVY, STURDY AND SAFE DESIGN: We designed the Sky with your kids safety in mind. It’s weighted base and sturdy design makes it safe around children and pets because it will not easily tip. The LED lamp don't heat up so that you do not burn yourself when you touch it to reposition the light. Brightech lamps are built to last and are the safest on the market!

BRIGHTECH'S 3 YEAR PRODUCT WARRANTY: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%, which is why we offer a full 3 year warranty. If your lamp has any defect or stops working within 3 years, we help you troubleshoot and/or send replacement parts or a whole new product. If any problems arise, please contact us because our number one goal is customer satisfaction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars10,305 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
